commands.commands: This command will list all available commands in the chat bot.
commands.bot: This command will display information about who the developer is and a website link.
commands.roadmap: This command will give a link in chat to the public Trello board.
commands.quote: This command will retrieve a random or specific quote for inspiration.
commands.rps: This command will let you play Rock-Paper-Scissors with Specter.
commands.story: This command will start a collaborative AI storytelling message.
commands.roulette: This command will kick off a playful game of roulette in chat.
commands.songrequest: This command will allow users to request songs for my Spotify queue (if your account is linked).
commands.songqueue: This command will show the current Spotify song request queue (if your account is linked).
commands.skipsong: This command allows users to skip the currently playing song in the queue.
commands.watchtime: This command will reveal how long you have been watching the stream.
commands.stoptimer: This command will stop a currently running timer.
commands.checktimer: This command will show the remaining time on an active timer.
commands.version: This command will display Specter's current running version.
commands.convert: This command will convert currencies or units as requested.
commands.subathon: This command will manage subathon events and countdown timers.
commands.todo: This command will handle the to-do list for stream tasks.
commands.kill: This command will simulate a fun 'kill' action for interactions.
commands.points: This command will show the current points balance of a user.
commands.slots: This command will run a slot machine game for chat fun.
commands.timer: This command will start a new countdown timer.
commands.game: This command will show the currently active game or status.
commands.gamble: This command will allow users to gamble their points for a chance to win more.
commands.joke: This command will tell a random joke for some laughs.
commands.ping: This command will check Specter's responsiveness to the internet.
commands.weather: This command will provide weather info for a specified location.
commands.time: This command will display the current time in a given timezone.
commands.song: This command will show details about the currently playing song: either via Spotify (if linked) or via Shazam (if you're a premium user).
commands.translate: This command will translate text into a specified language.
commands.cheerleader: This command will show the top user that has cheered the most in my channel.
commands.steam: This command will display information about the current playing game if it's on Steam.
commands.schedule: This command will show the stream's schedule and upcoming events.
commands.mybits: This command will display a user's bits statistics.
commands.lurk: This command will mark you as lurking.
commands.unlurk: This command will remove your lurking status.
commands.lurking: This command will notify that you are currently lurking.
commands.lurklead: This command will show the top most lurked user in your channel.
commands.userslurking: This command will show a count of users that are currently marked as lurking.
commands.clip: This command will create a clip of the current stream action.
commands.subscription: This command will display what subscription tier you are at.
commands.hug: This command will send a virtual hug to a mentioned user.
commands.highfive: This command will give a virtual high-five to a mentioned user.
commands.kiss: This command will send a playful virtual kiss to a mentioned user.
commands.uptime: This command will display how long the stream has been live.
commands.typo: This command will count how many typing errors a mentioned user has done.
commands.typos: This command will show a count of the number chat typos a mentioned user has made.
commands.followage: This command will show how long you have followed the channel.
commands.deaths: This command will display how many times you've died in-game.
commands.heartrate: This command will show your heart rate in chat. (if you have setup the hyperate code in your profile.)
commands.addcommand: This command will add a new custom command to the system.
commands.removecommand: This command will remove an existing custom command.
commands.editcommand: This command will edit an existing custom command.
commands.removetypos: This command will remove a type from a mentioned user.
commands.addpoints: This command will award points to a mentioned user.
commands.removepoints: This command will deduct points from a mentioned user.
commands.permit: This command will grant permission for special actions or commands.
commands.removequote: This command will delete a quote from the quote system.
commands.quoteadd: This command will add a new quote to the quote system.
commands.settitle: This command will update the stream's title.
commands.setgame: This command will update the stream's game category.
commands.edittypos: This command will edit the recorded typos for the mentioned user.
commands.deathadd: This command will increase the death count when you die in-game.
commands.deathremove: This command will decrease the death count to correct errors.
commands.shoutout: This command will give a shoutout to a notable user.
commands.marker: This command will set a marker in the stream for highlights.
commands.checkupdate: This command will check if Specter has a new update available.
commands.startlotto: This command will initiate a lottery among chat participants.
commands.drawlotto: This command will draw and announce the lottery winner(s).
commands.wsstatus: This command will check and display the WebSocket server connection status for the channel instance.
commands.obs: This command is used to interact with the OBS Connector app for BotOfTheSpecter.
